@mr_ligi @pedrouid @bmann @MPtherealMVP @Netlify @letsencrypt Just an FYI on those GitHub repo permissions requested - I understand the hesitancy... sadly the GitHub API isn't more granular than that. So we just grant that access on the client (never sent to the Netlify servers) just in that session to create a webhook on the repo.
